description: Try our easy to follow Baked Ravioli recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Soy free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Spinach,Beef,Peanut free
name: Baked Ravioli Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Combine ravioli, spinach, ricotta and 1 cup of the mozzarella in a 12-cup capacity baking dish.
Mix passata sauce with 1 cup water. Pour over ravioli mix. Sprinkle with prosciutto and remaining cheese. Bake for 30 minutes or until cooked through.
